channel.title: [PI] Disabling prayer in area

item.title: [PI] Disabling prayer in area
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“syndicatedpk, post:9, topic:384528”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=480293.msg3516001#msg3516001 date=1299004055]

        public boolean inGuard1()
    {
        return absX >= 2617 && absX <= 2593 && absY >= 4789 && absY <= 4761;
    }

Sorry if this is wrong but shouldn’t your boolean return either true or false?
[/quote]

no lol

EDIT: Got it working[/quote]
How?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Disabling prayer in area
item.dc:creator: @syndicatedpk syndicatedpk
item.description:
@syndicatedpk wrote:

[quote=“SGTCannon, post:6, topic:384528”][quote author=syndicatedpk link=topic=480293.msg3515977#msg3515977 date=1299001948]

It may be easier just to blank out the prayer tab for that section, like change the model from being clickable and opening the prayer tab to just blanking it.

no crap idea what you are talking about.

I don’t know how to properly explain it, my friend showed me a long time ago, but basically what you can do, is a certain command can make a certain tab be disabled

For example, you can disable the prayer tab so the icon dissappears and it is unclickable.

thx
aahh yeh if i knew how.
[/quote]

I personally don’t know how, but I will give him a call and if he still has the code, I will re-reply[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Disabling prayer in area
item.dc:creator: @syndicatedpk syndicatedpk
item.description:
@syndicatedpk wrote:


RED = 2617, 4789
ORANGE = 2593, 4761

i want to make so you cant use prayer in a area

in Player.java i have added

public boolean inGuard1() { return absX >= 2617 && absX <= 2593 && absY >= 4789 && absY <= 4761; }

and in combatAssistant.java

if (c.inGuard1()) { for(int p = 0; p < c.PRAYER.length; p++) { // reset prayer glows c.prayerActive[p] = false; c.getPA().sendFrame36(c.PRAYER_GLOW[p], 0); } c.sendMessage("You cannot use prayer in here!"); return; }
and i still can use prayer

will rep aswell

Read full topic
